scripts._build_gui: cd perpetuus-gui && npm run build && cd ../
scripts._build_push_docker_latest: docker build -t kyostenas/perpetuus:latest . && docker push kyostenas/perpetuus:latest
scripts._build_push_docker_version_number: VERSION=`npm -s run env echo ${npm_package_version}` && docker build -t kyostenas/perpetuus:$VERSION . && docker push kyostenas/perpetuus:$VERSION
